markdownRemark.html:
The websites and services I use to track some aspects of my life. It helps to keep tabs on habits and spendings.

Legend: open source

News, Podcasts, Content

  • Last.fm (music)
  • Goodreads (books)
  • Trakt.tv (movies, documentaries & tv shows)

Other apps that make it easy to download your history: NewPipe, Podcast Addict, (Pocket)

Food

  • Foursquare (restaurants)
  • Vivino (wine) / link
  • Untappd (beer) / link

Health, Sports

  • Strava (running & cycling)

Mobility, Travel

  • Tripline (maps of past trips) / link
  • MyFlightRadar24 (flights with carbon footprint) / link

Money

  • My Expenses / link

Other

  • Loop Habit Tracker / link
  • RescueTime (understand how you spend your time online) / link

To try out

  • Tomorrow (carbon footprint of your daily actions) / link
